Name: TypeOfMappedItem
Description: The type of item being mapped. The use of a controlled vocabulary is strongly recommended.

Name: MapName
Description: A name for the Map. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the Map. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the Map. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: SourceSchemeReference
Description: Mappings are unidirectional. The scheme referenced as the source is the scheme contents that would be transformed into the scheme contents identified as the target scheme contents.

Name: TargetSchemeReference
Description: Reference to the scheme containing the target structure.

Name: Correspondence
Description: Describe the level of similarity and difference between the Source and the Target schemes.

Name: ItemMap
Description: Contains the mappings for individual items within the Source and Target schemes.
